title: FS: 1911 T205 Gold Border - BUGS RAYMOND - BVG 5
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: FS: 1911 T205 Gold Border - BUGS RAYMOND - BVG 5
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is the following 1911 T205 Gold Border of Bugs Raymond:

1911 T205 Bugs Raymond - BVG 5 = $350

This short-print card is at the top of the list for all T205 collections.  The centering is perfect.  Soft corners and top/bottom centering on the back result in a technical condition of EX.

Paypal "gift/friend" preferred. I'll take care of all shipping charges. First to e-mail me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] and say "I'll take it" will be the new owner! 

Thanks for looking.
